headline: Is Bunge Global (BG) an Undervalued Defensive Stock for 2025?
summary: We recently published a list of 12 Undervalued Defensive Stocks for 2025. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Bunge Global SA (NYSE:BG) stands against other undervalued defensive stocks for 2025.
